alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 3:33PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Barnstable, southeastern Plymouth, southeastern Bristol and southeastern Newport Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 333 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Middleborough to near Middletown. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Plymouth, Dartmouth, Falmouth, Newport, Marion, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Portsmouth, Middletown, Fairhaven, Tiverton, Westport, Carver, Lakeville, Acushnet and Freetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
